Does anyone have experience from implementing Composite WPF for an application based on multiple windows. All sample seems to use a single window only.

I figured out that by manipulting the UnityBootstrapper I can register more shell windows in the RegionManager, but I guess I also need to make more adjustments when it comes to activating, showing and hiding.
Will there be more problems with this approach down the road? Anyone who has tried this out already?
